servinfo.title: Precaution on On-Board Diagnostic (OBD) System
servinfo.ptxt: Three kinds of OBD systems (Type A, B and C) are provided to N32A engine in accordance with regulations in each country.
Be sure to identify OBD system before servicing vehicle.

attention3.ptxt: For details of market code, refer to Identification Plate .

servinfosub.title: TYPE A:
servinfosub.ptxt: The following market codes adopt Type A.

spec.title: Market code of Type A OBD system

servinfosub.title: TYPE B:
servinfosub.ptxt: The following market codes adopt Type B.

spec.title: Market code of Type B OBD system

servinfosub.title: TYPE C:
servinfosub.ptxt: The following market codes adopt Type C.

spec.title: Market code of Type C OBD system
